definition: an imaginative lively style, especially style of writing
details:
noun
- an imaginative lively style, especially style of writing
= example: an imaginative lively style, especially style of writing
= synonyms: muscularity
- enterprising or ambitious drive
= example: enterprising or ambitious drive
= synonyms: push
- forceful exertion
= example: forceful exertion
= synonyms: zip
- any source of usable power
= example: any source of usable power
- (physics) a thermodynamic quantity equivalent to the capacity of a physical system to do work
= example: (physics) a thermodynamic quantity equivalent to the capacity of a physical system to do work
= synonyms: free energy
- a healthy capacity for vigorous activity
= example: a healthy capacity for vigorous activity
= synonyms: vitality
